routes.title: Limit traffic rates from source IP address
Register services in transparent proxy mode
Onboard services in transparent proxy mode
Verify requests with JWTS on VMs
Verify requests with JWTS on Kubernetes
Serve TLS certificate from external service
Enable WAN federation control plane traffic
Enable traffic across WAN federated datacenters
Configure TLS on an existing cluster
Use Vault for service mesh CA
Gossip with Consul template and Vault
mTLS with Consul template and Vault

metadata.title: Run WebAssembly plug-ins in Envoy proxy
metadata.description: Learn how to use the Consul wasm extension for Envoy, which directs Consul to run your WebAssembly (Wasm) plugins for Envoy proxies in your service mesh.

outlineItems.title: Run WebAssembly plug-ins in Envoy proxy

pageHeading.title: Run WebAssembly plug-ins in Envoy proxy

mdxSource.compiledSource:
const makeShortcode=name=>function MDXDefaultShortcode(props){console.warn("Component "+name+" was not imported, exported, or provided by MDXProvider as global scope");return mdx("div",props)};const CodeTabs=makeShortcode("CodeTabs");const CodeBlockConfig=makeShortcode("CodeBlockConfig");const Warning=makeShortcode("Warning");const layoutProps={};const MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components,...props}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...props,components:components,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`This topic describes how to use the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`wasm`),` extension, which directs Consul to run your WebAssembly (Wasm) plug-ins for Envoy proxies.`),mdx("p",null,`You can create Wasm plugins for Envoy and integrate them using the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`wasm`),` extension. Wasm is a binary instruction format for stack-based virtual machines that has the potential to run anywhere after it has been compiled. Wasm plug-ins run as filters in a service mesh application's sidecar proxy.`),mdx("h2",{"id":"workflow"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h2","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#workflow","aria-label":"workflow permalink"},`\xbb`),`Workflow`),mdx("p",null,`Complete the following steps to use the Wasm Envoy extension:`),mdx("ul",null,mdx("li",{parentName:"ul"},`Create your Wasm plugin. metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
